title: Covid-19 death toll moves up with 25 new victims
content: The Director-General of Health Services has confirmed 25 new coronavirus-related fatalities for February 15, moving the death toll in the country from the virus to 15,899.This includes 20 males and 05 females, according to the Department of Government Information.Six of the deceased were in the age group of 30-59 years. The remaining 19 victims were aged 60 years and above.
